anime.description: Port city "Libra". Libra is composed of 3 sections: "Upper town" --- the center of politics, economy, and culture, where "the wealth" of the town concentrated; "Outside" --- a hotbed of crime and corruption, where people doubt each other and "Bridge" --- the only place connecting Upper town and Outside separated by a huge canal. Libra is a town which as if represents the mankind`s sense of discrimination by itself. http://anidb.net/ch103332 [Sonia], a young female detective, who transfers to Outside from Upper town, investigates many mysterious cases and meets 3 ugly figures who fight to protect human being. She wonders, who on earth they are... Three monster Youkai-Ningen are living secretly behind people`s back, each having different thoughts in mind. http://anidb.net/ch100706 [Bem] devotes himself to defeat evil for human being, wishing to become human himself someday. http://anidb.net/ch100707 [Bela] is also attracted by human being and eager to become one, going to school and trying to understand what is human being. http://anidb.net/ch100708 [Belo], on the other hand, sees through human nature and the world, and gets absorbed in gaming. All the more they interact with humans, they get hurt. Because of their ugly figure, they never get accepted by humans, even if they sacrifice themselves in the fight to protect human being... Then there is a http://anidb.net/ch103336 [mysterious lady] who is searching for those three Youkai-Ningen. She controls "a concealed assembly" which is dominating Libra in the back. What is the purpose of her conspiracy to capture Bem and the others? Source: Official website

character.name: Bem
character.description: The leader of three YOUKAI-NINGEN, carrying out his own justice at any time. He has a faith that "by defeating evil and saving human being, someday he can become a human." Whenever he senses a sign of the evil, he makes his appearance throughout Libra, both in Upper town and Outside. He assesses situations precisely and always prioritize the safety of other human beings. Though he is a quiet and expressionless person and appears to be cold-hearted, he treats BELA and BELO as his family and look after them. He has a high intelligence and a tough body with special ability to control an electricity. Source: Official page

character.name: Bela
character.description: The only female of the YOUKAI-NINGEN. She admires for a human being, and craves for becoming one herself. She usually goes to a prestigious school "Cent Joseph high school" located in Upper town, hiding her true identity under the name "Annabella" and enjoys the school life with her classmates. For her, this is an effort to get along with human society when the time comes to her to become a human being. Because she faces the fact that YOUKAI-NINGEN is different from other human being, she does not have a strong prejudice against humans, but is often hurt by that very fact. She is by nature an expressive person, but because she is usually with silent BEM and BELO, she does not talk a lot. She gracefully handles a whip which is hidden in her right arm. She also has a special ability to handle a freezing air. Source: Official page

character.name: Belo
character.description: BELO is the third YOUKAI-NINGEN who has a cool stance towards the world and human being. He is skilled in gaming and usually spends all his time in the game arcade of Outside with his friends. This might be because he wants to escape from inconvenience and cooped-up feeling to live as a YOUKAI-NINGEN, without concerning about unnecessary things. He always wears a headphone, pretending not to listen to the story of others, because he wants to keep some distance from a human society. He often says ironic things to BEM and BELA, but he give much thought to them so that they don`t get hurt. He fights against the evil with his agility. He does not have a special ability, but there is a sign of the development. Source: Official page

character.name: Dr. Recycle
character.description: A mysterious surgeon and scientist in Outside. Remodeling people who no longer wants to live as human and gives them a demonic power. Source: Official page

character.name: Joel Woods
character.description: A detective who belongs to 18th branch of Outside. He is unmotivated man and always swayed by Sonia who breaks a rule of Outside. Source: Official page

character.name: Sonia Summers
character.description: The young female detective who believes in justice. She is so serious and stubborn that she has been demoted from Upper town to 18th branch of Outside. She does not follow the custom of Outside and instead always tries to carry through what she believes to be right. Source: Official page

character.name: Daryl Bryson
character.description: A son of the secretary for politician of the Upper town. He is a skilled gamer who won many video game championships. Source: Official page

character.name: Helmut Felt
character.description: A detective who gets transferred to 18th branch of Outside on a mission to capture YOUKAI-NINGEN. He is a man of cruelty and does anything for his duty. Source: Official page

character.name: Roddy Walker
character.description: A classmate of the high school where BELA goes to. He admires BELA, known as Annabella in his school. Source: Official page

character.name: Nazo no Onna
character.description: An existence who controls "a concealed assembly" which rules “Libra” in the back. She conspires to capture BEM and other YOUKAI-NINGEN. Source: Official page
